name: AIMusic.so
description: AIMusic.so is an AI-powered platform for generating royalty-free music, lyrics, sound effects, and MP4 lyric videos from text prompts, accessible without sign-up.
longDescription: AIMusic.so is an innovative AI music generation platform designed to help creators produce high-quality, royalty-free music, lyrics, and sound effects effortlessly. It enables users to transform simple text descriptions into professional-grade tracks, catering to content creators, musicians, and businesses. The platform supports a wide range of genres and moods, making it ideal for videos, podcasts, and commercials. No sign-up is required for its free tier, allowing instant access to music creation tools. With advanced features like vocal removal and lyric video generation, AIMusic.so streamlines the creative process. Its subscription model unlocks commercial licensing and higher audio quality for professional use.
features: Text-to-Music AI generates full songs from simple text prompts, enabling quick creation of professional tracks in any style.
AI Lyrics Generator creates original lyrics based on keywords, themes, or emotions, providing a starting point for songwriting.
Vocal Remover isolates vocals from any track, perfect for creating instrumental versions for various projects.
MP4 Lyrics Video Generator produces visually engaging lyric videos for social media platforms like TikTok, enhancing music promotion.
Sound Effects Generator creates high-quality, customizable sound effects for videos, games, and podcasts, enhancing production quality.
Royalty-Free Music Download allows subscribers to use generated music in commercial projects without additional licensing fees.
Simple Mode offers quick song creation with minimal input, ideal for beginners or rapid prototyping.
Custom Mode provides detailed control over lyrics, style, and song structure for tailored music creation.
High-Quality Audio Output ensures studio-grade sound for professional-grade content across all generated tracks.
No Sign-Up Required enables instant music generation for free users, making the platform highly accessible.

faqs.question: How do I start creating music on AIMusic.so?
faqs.answer: Visit AIMusic.so, click 'Generate Music,' provide a song description or lyrics, choose a style, and the AI will create your track instantly, no sign-up needed.

faqs.question: Is the music generated by AIMusic.so royalty-free?
faqs.answer: Music generated under a paid subscription is royalty-free and includes a commercial license, while free-tier music is limited to personal use.

faqs.question: Can I create instrumental tracks without lyrics?
faqs.answer: Yes, toggle the 'Instrumental' option in Simple Mode to generate tracks without lyrics, perfect for background music.

faqs.question: What types of projects can use AIMusic.so’s music?
faqs.answer: The platform’s music is ideal for YouTube videos, podcasts, commercials, and social media content, with commercial use available for subscribers.

faqs.question: Does AIMusic.so offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, AIMusic.so provides free daily usage for generating music and sound effects, though with limited features compared to the paid plan.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my AIMusic.so subscription easily?
faqs.answer: Subscribers can cancel their subscription anytime via the user settings at aimusic.so/user/settings or by contacting support.

faqs.question: How does the vocal remover feature work?
faqs.answer: The AI vocal remover isolates vocals from any song, allowing users to create instrumental versions quickly and easily.

faqs.question: Can I generate sound effects for my projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, AIMusic.so’s sound effects generator creates custom, high-quality audio effects for videos, games, and podcasts based on user descriptions.

faqs.question: What music styles are supported by AIMusic.so?
faqs.answer: The platform supports various styles like pop, reggae, classical, and electronic, customizable via text prompts or style selection.
